div.p: The authoritative source or rules for values supplied in maintenanceStatus.

The authoritative source or rules for values supplied in physDescStructuredType within physDescStructured. If the value "otherPhysDescStructuredTypeEncoding" is selected an alternate code list should be specified in conventionDeclaration. This optional attribute is available only in control

div.egXML: <control countryEncoding="iso3166-1" dateEncoding="iso8601" languageEncoding="otherLanguageEncoding" repositoryEncoding="iso15511" scriptEncoding="iso15924" physDescStructuredTypeEncoding="EASList"> [...] </control>
